meanings.definition: The time of day when the sun sets and darkness begins.
meanings.sent1: At nightfall, the sky turns dark and the stars come out.
meanings.sent2: We always go for a walk at nightfall to enjoy the cool evening breeze.
meanings.sent3: The cat eagerly awaits nightfall to start hunting for mice in the garden.
meanings.sent4: As nightfall descended, the city lights started twinkling like scattered diamonds.
meanings.sent5: The beauty of nightfall is unmatched, with its peaceful transition from day to night.

meanings.definition: The beginning of darkness at the end of the day.
meanings.sent1: Nightfall brings a sense of calm as the world quiets down.
meanings.sent2: The birds chirped their last songs before nightfall settled in.
meanings.sent3: The children played hide-and-seek until nightfall, giggling in the dark.
meanings.sent4: Nightfall crept in slowly, wrapping everything in a blanket of shadows.
meanings.sent5: The magic of nightfall is in the way it transforms the landscape into a mysterious realm.
